page.title: Post-Stroke Rehabilitation
page.content: Add to Favorites Image Download PDF (366.92 KB) Enter Quantity (Limit: 10) Add to Cart A fact sheet to help stroke survivors, their families, and their caregivers understand the importance of rehabilitation after a stroke and to identify the appropriate types of services for their particular situation. Included are resources for more information about the full range of rehabilitation services.
